title: Some games I wont be able to connect to
body: For the past couple of months for whatever reason I can not connect to games, it will either not load all together, bugsplat in the loading screen, or it disconnects me and then when I try to log back in it says my username or password is wrong. I have been getting 20 minute queue timers now and its very frustrating. Has anyone else had this issue and know what to do? I have a MSI GE62 6QF Apache pro.

replies.body:
Until we can iron out all these troubles you're having, I suggest testing any troubleshooting steps in a practice game to avoid getting those low priority queues. 

It seems like you're having a few different problems all at once, so let's start with those games not loading at all. Sometimes your network can have a hard time getting connected to specific servers due to how your ISP is sending your signal or possibly just some awkward settings. Take a few minutes to double check your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) for anything that could be configured a little better, test it in a custom or practice game, and let me know how it helps.

I have changed some network settings and also did the repair in the login screen. I went into a custom game and everything seemed to work perfectly. I will let you know if it goes back to disconnecting. Thank you for the help!
